The main purpose of this web page is for me to understand the literature of risk sharing.
For this, I

- summarize the literature of risk sharing, and
- replicate numerical exercises in some of the risk-sharing papers.

This page is maintained by [Mizuhiro Suzuki](https://github.com/mizuhirosuzuki).
